name: Web Config Changer
description: Swap out the value pair within a web.config file.
author: Ray Lomax
helpMarkDown: Swap out the value pair within a web.config file.

inputs.name: xPath
inputs.label: Output Folder.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where you wish the APK to be copied to.

inputs.name: Keys
inputs.label: Array of keys to locate.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Array of keys to locate and swap out the value.

inputs.name: newValues
inputs.label: Array of values which will be used to replace.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Array of values to swap out the existing value.

inputs.name: attribute
inputs.label: Attribute.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Attribute to use which will be swapped out.
